statements: SELECT * FROM event_schedule;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_time FROM event_schedule;
SELECT event_name, ticket_price FROM event_schedule WHERE event_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT event_name, venue_id FROM event_schedule WHERE ticket_price > 50.00;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date, event_time, venue_id, ticket_price FROM event_schedule ORDER BY event_date DESC, venue_id ASC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_time FROM event_schedule;
SELECT * FROM event_schedule WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT event_name, venue_id, ticket_price FROM event_schedule WHERE ticket_price > 50 AND event_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_time FROM event_schedule WHERE venue_id = 3 ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(ticket_price) AS max_ticket_price, MIN(ticket_price) AS min_ticket_price FROM event_schedule;
SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, ticket_price FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT venue_id, venue_name, capacity FROM venues ORDER BY venue_name ASC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, ticket_price FROM events WHERE venue_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM venues WHERE capacity >= 1000 ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-05-01'
SELECT event_name, ticket_price FROM events WHERE venue_id = 3 ORDER BY ticket_price DESC
SELECT venue_name, venue_location, capacity FROM venues ORDER BY capacity DESC
SELECT event_name, event_date, ticket_price FROM events WHERE ticket_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 LIMIT 5
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date, ticket_price FROM events INNER JOIN venues ON events.venue_id = venues.venue_id
SELECT * FROM event_schedule;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_time FROM event_schedule WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date, venue_name FROM event_schedule JOIN venue_details ON event_schedule.venue_id = venue_details.venue_id;
SELECT DISTINCT event_name FROM event_schedule;
SELECT event_name, ticket_price FROM event_schedule JOIN ticketing_information ON event_schedule.event_id = ticketing_information.event_id;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_time FROM event_schedule;
SELECT * FROM event_schedule WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT venue_name, venue_location FROM venue_details WHERE venue_capacity >= 500;
SELECT ticket_price, ticket_quantity FROM ticketing_information ORDER BY ticket_price DESC;
SELECT event_name, venue_name FROM event_schedule JOIN venue_details ON event_schedule.venue_id = venue_details.venue_id;
SELECT * FROM EventSchedule;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM EventSchedule WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT event_name, venue_name, ticket_type FROM EventSchedule JOIN VenueDetails ON EventSchedule.event_id = VenueDetails.venue_id JOIN TicketingInformation ON EventSchedule.event_id = TicketingInformation.event_id;
SELECT event_name, venue_address FROM EventSchedule JOIN VenueDetails ON EventSchedule.event_id = VenueDetails.venue_id WHERE event_date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT event_name, ticket_type, ticket_price FROM EventSchedule JOIN TicketingInformation ON EventSchedule.event_id = TicketingInformation.event_id WHERE ticket_price > 50.00;
SELECT * FROM EventSchedule;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM EventSchedule WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT event_name, event_time, ticket_type FROM EventSchedule, TicketingInformation, EventManagement WHERE EventSchedule.event_id = EventManagement.event_id AND TicketingInformation.ticket_id = EventManagement.ticket_id;
SELECT venue_name, venue_address, venue_capacity FROM VenueDetails WHERE venue_capacity > 1000;

SELECT event_name, ticket_price FROM EventSchedule, TicketingInformation, EventManagement WHERE EventSchedule.event_id = EventManagement.event_id AND TicketingInformation.ticket_id = EventManagement.ticket_id ORDER BY ticket_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM event_schedules;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_time FROM event_schedules WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, venue_name FROM event_schedules JOIN venues ON event_schedules.venue_id = venues.venue_id;
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT event_name, ticket_price FROM event_schedules JOIN tickets ON event_schedules.event_id = tickets.event_id;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_time FROM event_schedules WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT venue_name, venue_address FROM venues WHERE venue_name LIKE '%Hall%' AND venue_address <> '123 Main Street';

SELECT event_name, venue_name, booking_date FROM event_schedules JOIN event_venues ON event_schedules.event_id = event_venues.event_id JOIN venues ON event_venues.venue_id = venues.venue_id WHERE booking_date BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-04-30' ORDER BY booking_date ASC;

SELECT event_name, SUM(ticket_price * ticket_quantity) AS total_revenue FROM event_schedules JOIN tickets ON event_schedules.event_id = tickets.event_id GROUP BY event_name HAVING total_revenue > 1000 ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT event_name, customer_name, booking_date FROM event_schedules JOIN bookings ON event_schedules.event_id = bookings.event_id WHERE booking_date < '2022-06-15';
